thread.section_title: Lidos Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value
thread.title_full: Great value - Review of Lidos Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Shower_Says_It_All
title: Great value
text: Central London hotels are generally expensive and of variable quality. OK, this is not a five star hotel, but why pay for five star treatment when all that one really needs is somewhere to sleep for the night. My room was just fine, very well presented, the shower was indeed good, breakfast was included, it was amazingly quiet, it is reasonably conveniently located, the staff were friendly, and all of that for well under Â£100 in central London. Really, really great value.
